1.2.name: wordpress/wireclub-chat
1.2.description:
I hope you enjoy our embedded chat plug-in. It is completely free and we just ask that you do not remove our links because this is how we are able keep it as a free service. If you remove our links, you can expect to be punished by karma. What goes around...comes around!

Important note about room names: Rooms are globaly shared across all users of this plug-in.

Example: if you and a friend want to have a shared room, just install the plug-in and pick the same room name. If you want to make sure your room isn't shared, just pick a unique name!

To know more about Wireclub: http://www.wireclub.com
